00031 ConfigMenu::ConfigMenu(void)
00032   : Menu("cli-config", Help()
00033         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI settings menu")),
00034     m_pcliEcho(NULL), m_pcliEchoOn(NULL), m_pcliEchoOff(NULL),
00035     m_pcliBeep(NULL), m_pcliBeepOn(NULL), m_pcliBeepOff(NULL)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 ConfigMenu::~ConfigMenu(void)
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 void ConfigMenu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00044 {
00045     Menu::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00046     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify echo behavior"));
00047         m_pcliEcho = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("echo", cli_Help)));
00048         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo on"));
00049             m_pcliEchoOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00050             m_pcliEchoOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00051         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo off"));
00052             m_pcliEchoOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00053             m_pcliEchoOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00054     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify beep behavior"));
00055         m_pcliBeep = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("beep", cli_Help)));
00056         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep on"));
00057             m_pcliBeepOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00058             m_pcliBeepOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00059         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep off"));
00060             m_pcliBeepOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00061             m_pcliBeepOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00062 }
00063 
00064 const bool ConfigMenu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00065 {
00066     int i_CmdLineIndex = 0;
00067     const cli::Element* pcli_Element = NULL;
00068     #define CLI_STEP_IT() do { if (i_CmdLineIndex >= CLI_CmdLine.GetElementCount()) return false; pcli_Element = & CLI_CmdLine[i_CmdLineIndex++]; } while(0)
00069 
00070     CLI_STEP_IT();
00071     if (0) {}
00072     else if (pcli_Element == & GetEchoNode())
00073     {
00074         CLI_STEP_IT();
00075         if (0) {}
00076         else if (pcli_Element == & GetEchoOnNode())
00077         {
00078             CLI_STEP_IT();
00079             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00080             {
00081                 EchoOn();
00082                 return true;
00083             }
00084         }
00085         else if (pcli_Element == & GetEchoOffNode())
00086         {
00087             CLI_STEP_IT();
00088             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00089             {
00090                 EchoOff();
00091                 return true;
00092             }
00093         }
00094     }
00095     else if (pcli_Element == & GetBeepNode())
00096     {
00097         CLI_STEP_IT();
00098         if (0) {}
00099         else if (pcli_Element == & GetBeepOnNode())
00100         {
00101             CLI_STEP_IT();
00102             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00103             {
00104                 BeepOn();
00105                 return true;
00106             }
00107         }
00108         else if (pcli_Element == & GetBeepOffNode())
00109         {
00110             CLI_STEP_IT();
00111             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00112             {
00113                 BeepOff();
00114                 return true;
00115             }
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     return Menu::ExecuteReserved(CLI_CmdLine);
00120 }
00121 
00122 const bool ConfigMenu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00123 {
00124     return false;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void ConfigMenu::EchoOn(void) const
00128 {
00129     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, true);
00130     GetOutputStream() << "echo is on" << endl;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void ConfigMenu::EchoOff(void) const
00134 {
00135     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, false);
00136     GetOutputStream() << "echo is off" << endl;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void ConfigMenu::BeepOn(void) const
00140 {
00141     GetShell().SetBeep(true);
00142     GetOutputStream() << "beep is on" << endl;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void ConfigMenu::BeepOff(void) const
00146 {
00147     GetShell().SetBeep(false);
00148     GetOutputStream() << "beep is off" << endl;
00149 }

00151 Keyword& ConfigMenu::GetEchoNode(void)
00152 {
00153     return *m_pcliEcho;
00154 }
00155 
00156 const Keyword& ConfigMenu::GetEchoNode(void) const
00157 {
00158     return *m_pcliEcho;
00159 }

00162 {
00163     return *m_pcliEchoOn;

00167 {
00168     return *m_pcliEchoOn;
00169 }

00177 {
00178     return *m_pcliEchoOff;

00188     return *m_pcliBeep;

00198     return *m_pcliBeepOn;
